thread.title: great economy hotel
thread.title_full: great economy hotel - Review of Pod 51 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lscott18
title: great economy hotel
text: Hi stayed at Pod 51 Sep.2016. The rooms are small, but it's NYC. The roof top is awesome! Everything is very clean and there's lots of local restaurants close by. Subway is not far and I enjoyed walking to the Met to enjoy it on a Sat night. would stay here again - even the shared bathroom and showers was not bad after all.
